item.title: How to Get Yourself FREE Gift Cards - The Easiest Way 2019!
item.description:

item.title: Win Yourself a PS4 PRO! (US Only)
item.description: If you love to play video games then you know PS4 is a top-selling console and you want it! Therefore, here’s your chance to win yourself a PS4 PRO.

item.title: Play for a Chance to Win $150,000 in Cash Instanty
item.description: Do you have a minute? This is once a lifetime opportunity to win yourself hundreds of dollars to purchase your dream item or just to enjoy.

item.title: Get Fortnite Save The World (US Only)
item.description: Save The World mode is a really fun mode in Fortnite but the drawback is that it isn’t free! However, we are giving it away to few people.

item.title: Chance to Collect 13,500 Fortnite V-Bucks for Season 9 (US Only)
item.description: Season 9 is here but if you do not have v-bucks then you surely won’t be happy! However, we will help you so don’t you worry.

item.title: Win an iPhone XR! (US Only)
item.description: Looking to purchase that expensive great looking iPhone XR? Well, why not try your luck to actually win one for free!
